name: HOTSHOT INSIGHTS
text: Won’t answer the phone I go to order a pizza they won’t even take my order till noon. I call back at 1245. No answer. If u weren’t selling diesel u would be out of business. …More

name: Robbie Pederson
text: This is on the south west side of the interchange in a gas station with a red roof if you are looking for it.  I love Godfathers and was a bit apprehensive because of the whole "in a gas station" but I was pleasantly surprised as it was a …More

name: Scott Griffis
text: I really like that you can now get chicken on their taco pizza.  Also there is a new Fiesta Pizza I am excited to try!

name: Dobber Malchi
text: Okay wish godfathers had more locations as each one is different.
